Detailed Description

Message router.

Manages message communication between IPMP agents.

Definition at line 57 of file MessageRouter.h.

Parameters:
logger message logger.
In case of an error, throws MessageRouterException.

MESSAGEROUTER_EXPORT DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MessageRouter::~MessageRouter (   ) 
 

Destructor.

Decrease number of references to deliverer and if it drops to 0, stop thread and clean up everything.

In case of an error, throws MessageRouterException.
